thread.section_title: The Benjamin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good location and good service
thread.title_full: Very good location and good service - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: justravel
title: Very good location and good service
text:
We stayed here for 3 nights on a business trip and found the location very good to both the office but also the sites.
Pros: Rooms are well appointed and comfortable. Good hot water on demand. Great location.
Cons: A little older thus smaller bathrooms. (not a problem for us but for larger people may be an issue) Lower floor rooms facing the street will hear street noise. I asked for an interior room higher up and it was much better. They were accommodating based on availability.
Overall good, we would definitely stay there again.
